title: How to Attend a Midnight Launch Event for a Video Game

steps.headline: Find out if the video game store you're going to is holding a midnight launch event for the game you want.
steps.description: Not all stores hold a midnight launch event. Look up the store's phone number and call it to see if the store is holding one.

steps.headline: Preorder the game you want at least a few days in advance.
Know when the game will be released.
steps.description: Games will sometimes be delayed, so be sure that you keep up on its release date.

steps.headline: Get there ahead of time to beat the crowd.
steps.description: On the day before the game is released, go to the store at 10:00 PM at the latest. You may want to head there earlier depending on the popularity of the game, how popular the store is, and how large your town/city is.

steps.headline: Wait patiently until midnight.
steps.description: Talk to the people around you, as they're also looking to get the game. You could also play games on a handheld video game console if you brought one, play board games if you have some with you, or read a book.

steps.headline: Go into the store when it's midnight, and get your new game.
steps.description: Don't stay up too late playing it when you get home, though!
